###  统筹费用时序
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
# basic visualization package
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.rcParams['font.sans-serif']=['kaiTi']##中文乱码
plt.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus']=False ##坐标负号

# datetime oprations

# to get web contents
from urllib.request import urlopen
import seaborn as sns

# interactive visualization
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objs as go
# import plotly.figure_factory as ff
from plotly.subplots import make_subplots

source.e3a8d535:
df=pd.read_csv(r"../input/full-data/full.csv",encoding="gb18030")
df["结算日期"]=pd.to_datetime(df["结算日期"])
df.set_index(["结算日期"],inplace=True)
df.head()

msno.bar(df)
plt.show()
source.6de15413:
###时序图
temp = df.groupby('结算日期')[ '统筹费用'].sum().reset_index()
temp = temp.melt(id_vars="结算日期", value_vars=[ '统筹费用'],
                 var_name='Class', value_name='Count')
#temp.head()

fig = px.area(temp, x="结算日期", y="Count", color='Class', height=500, width=700,
             title='统筹费用时序图', color_discrete_sequence = [rec, dth, act])
fig.update_layout(xaxis_rangeslider_visible=True)
fig.show()

source.636d891e:
fig=px.pie(patients_count.head(10), values='count', names='诊断名称', 
       title='诊断名称分布', 
       color_discrete_sequence=px.colors.sequential.Bluered,hole=.4)  ## Hot、Bluered、Blues 
fig.update_traces(textposition='inside', textinfo='percent+label')
source.3ec09f91:
## 街道统计
region_count = df.街道.value_counts().reset_index()
region_count.columns = ['街道名称', 'count']
#region_count
fig=px.pie(region_count.head(10), values='count', names='街道名称', 
       title='参保人员所在地分布', 
       color_discrete_sequence=px.colors.sequential.Jet,hole=.4)  ## Hot、Bluered、Blues 、Greens
fig.update_traces(textposition='inside', textinfo='percent+label')
source.14ab4744:
## 看病人数最多的前20个地方
import plotly.graph_objects as go
##
fig = px.bar(region_count.head(20), y='街道名称', text='count',x="count", color='街道名称')
# Put bar total value above bars with 2 values of precision
fig.update_traces(texttemplate='%{text:.2}', textposition='outside')
# Set fontsize and uniformtext_mode='hide' says to hide the text if it won't fit
fig.update_layout(uniformtext_minsize=8)
# Rotate labels 45 degrees
fig.update_layout(xaxis_tickangle=-45)
fig
